SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, content, viewcount, to_char(regdate,'MM-DD') AS regdate FROM review
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM review
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, content, viewcount, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM review) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (num, writer, pwd, title, content, viewcount, regdate) VALUES(review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{pwd}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewcount}, SYSDATE)
